title: Solar water heating
creator_credit: CSIRO, S.T. Evans, Roger Morse and Ted Davey
brief_description: Collecting solar energy for use in water heaters. A CSIRO scientist explains how the absorbers work and, with the aid of diagrams, how they operate on the principle of thermo-cyclic-flow. Their installation and economy are also demonstrated.
creator_credit_for_label: CSIRO, S.T. Evans, Roger Morse and Ted Davey
